normalised: Arre yaar, hee currentaachim billam haddaache bhair zataati! Fati mhainey rupee paanch hazaar paanchshe asle, aani hee pavtim rupee saha hazaar donnshe asa! Mhaka disonk lagta mhozo fridge guptapanan Bitcoin mining korta mhanun. Hunv sogle dive bond korun meenvattanchea uzvaddan jiyevonk zai aslem. Tem romanchik astolem, aani mhojem bill fokot rupee pon'nas astolem. Hmmm, khorem mhunnttlear, rupee ekso korunk sodhiyum, kamit kami punkho chalu dovrunk zai!
